name: Cat Blast Pop
description:
Cat Blast Pop from LinkDesks Inc. is an addictive cat game with various different puzzles! Join millions now in the best cat blast pop game ever!

Hurry to jump into the cat blast pop bubble world!
Our game is designed for both kids & adults!
Enjoy this superior pop bubble cat game!

------------------------------------
Features of Cat Blast Pop game:
- With all new experiences & design!
- New Bubble Blocks - 5 Styles of Cats.

How to Play Cat Blast Pop Game:
- Tap two or more bubble blocks of the same cats!
- There is no time limit! Reach the target points of each stage.
- Magic fish can help you change the colors of cats.

Tips on Scoring:
- The more cats you pop, the more score you will get.
- Try to clear all cats, you will get a lot of bonus.

------------------------------------
Cat Blast Pop - Match, Blast & Pop Game!
More than millions of players & a variety of puzzles are waiting for you in Cat Blast Pop!
